descriptionHtml:
[color=#efefef]Requires Dawnguard! 

All credit for horse armour meshes go to [b]Mystikhybrid and his Horse Armor mod - [/b][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13348/?[/b]

Arvak now has blue-glowing deadric armour, Enjoy. 

Compatability - This is a purely cosmetic change, it will not conflict with any other mod that doesn't give Arvak a saddle. 

I highly recomend using this alongside this mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24019/? - I use the Classic Soul Cairn version. 

This is my 1st published mod, please tell me if something doesn't work correctly.

Also on Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=341814273[/color]
author: Dragoler
